(Single Player) Very cool game play that draws you in and makes you use your brain. Though it could get hard/ frustrating, it's still an awesome game that you'll come back to after cooling down.

(Multiplayer) Makes you realize how dumb you and your friends are.
very fun platformer and story game
wish you could have more than 2 people but still really fun

I remember playing the first Portal years ago. The game (Portal 1) was really fun and puzzling. You couldn't go wrong anything. and then.... this game came out. and was JUST as fun as the first one. Better puzzles, two players, and just all-round mind-blowing game. 10/10 its also a fun puzzle game for people who don't normally play puzzle games.
Epic puzzle game where u have to think hard.
portal gun shoot portal. fun time. :)))
Great Game.  Baba Booey.  And word to your mother!
Very tricky and uses some time I like it!
Da gaem is good! everyone knows that!

one of best coop experiences ever
esta bueno  no es el juego del siglo pero es muy entretenido y no es aburrido la trama me encanto

I'm in Space.
Is a good game. Play it with Friends.
good game havent finished it yet but its super fun

Интересная и захватывающая игра.
Теперь я могу понять, почему это игра понравилась такому огромному количеству людей.Помимо сложных головоломок, есть и хорошо прописанные персонажи.Так же есть неожиданный и резкий поворот в сюжете.Сам сюжет загадочный, и мне все таки не удалось разобраться c тем, что произошло с миром до пробуждения главной героини.Помимо всех перечисленных плюсов, в игре много пасхалок и смешных шуток.А, чуть не забыл упоминуть об мультиплеере, с несколькими концовками.
В общем рекомендую эту игру и смело ставлю 10 из 10
Muito bom, mesmo os graficos não sendo ''bom'' igual os jogos de hoje, Historia muito boa  e otima experiencia jogando esse jogo.
lost 10 friends other than that. Great game. (If I see the color orange and blue in real life, I will die)

One of the few games I've stuck with since I got it, still got some work to do for achievements but I'm not in a rush, I just like replaying the game whenever I feel like I need it.

10/10 recommend very cool game :)

Vraiment une supère expérience ce jeu, je le recommande à n'importe qui qui n'a pas peur de se remuer un peu les méninges. Les divers personnages sont vraiment bien joués et munis d'un doublage excellent, quand à l'humour noir et froids de ces derniers l'est vraiment aussi. Une excellente immersion qui m'a fait passer de très bons moments en compagnie de Wheasley comme de Glados. Et la fin est aussi inattendue qu'amusante comme n'importes quels joueurs puissent l’espérer. Merci Valve pour cette aventure qui vaut bien plus que son prix.
Solving the puzzles on your own and without a guide makes you feel smarter than Einstein
I love this game, I enjoyed it a lot ♥♥♥
This game is incredibly fun and takes the story and mechanics of the first game to a new and higher degree. If you enjoyed the first game, you're sure to enjoy this one even more.

GLaDOS的本子针不戳（

很难想象当时决战时给我留下的印象有多么深刻
只记得当时人完全傻掉，下意识的朝月球开了那一枪
如同那张《我看不懂，但我大受震撼》
完结之后大汗淋漓，仿佛被导演夺走了童贞
电梯门打开，冰冷而猩红的激光眼瞄准了我
我以为GLaDOS终究要杀人灭口，把光圈的秘密永远埋葬在地底
随机《Still Alive》响起，我感觉溺水了又浮上水面
感谢V社制作出了如此的瑰宝

i like it its good story cant wait for handeld mode on the steam deck
非常有趣，有点难但是通过思考基本都可以找到正确的方法，形象的比喻就是一款3D益智游戏
